did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Adolf Hitler Miscellaneous Papers,

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 3 manuscript boxes, 2 oversize boxes, 2 card file boxes, 5 envelopes, 2 microfilm reels, 5 phonotape reels, 1 phonorecord

did.abstract: Drafts (typewritten) of two speeches by Adolf Hitler, one relating to the shooting of Ernst Röhm and others, 1934, and the other delivered at a Nazi party convention, 1937; his appointment book, March to June, 1943; photographs, bust and a ceramic tile portrait of him; lists of books in his library; a copy of his death certificate; recordings of two speeches by him, 1937 and 1941; and miscellaneous office files of the German Imperial Chancellery, 1879-1945.
